analyst.default: and a.analyst in ('Nick Hadjigeorge', 'Lena Geraghty', 'Eric Reese')

lead.default: and a.lead in ('Matt Raifman', 'Sheila Dugan', 'Katherine Klosek', 'Matt Pazoles')

status.default: and a.status in ('Scheduled Site Visit','Eligible','Applied','Working','Completed Site Visit','Accepted','Completed')

options.sql: SELECT cartodb_id, the_geom, concat, city, state, statelong, latitude, longitude, status, scope1, scope2, scope3, latest_news, lead, analyst, notes, wikipedia, picturelink, xpath_query, in_assessment_pipeline, scope_blurb, start_date, end_date, timeline_progress, pop, threeyrgrowth, mayor, nonwhite, poverty, income, ST_Scale(the_geom_webmercator,1.4,1.4) as the_geom_webmercator FROM wwcapplicantmap a where a.latitude is not null <%= status %> <%= scope %> <%= lead %> <%= analyst %>  <%= timeline_progress %>
